meanings.sent1: The artist immortalises his love for nature in his paintings.
meanings.sent2: The writer immortalises her memories in her diary.
meanings.sent3: The chef immortalises his favorite recipe by passing it down through generations.
meanings.sent4: The photographer immortalises the beauty of the sunset in a breathtaking image.
meanings.sent5: The singer immortalises the emotions of the song through her powerful voice.

meanings.definition: To preserve or commemorate in a lasting way.
meanings.sent1: The museum immortalises historical artifacts for future generations to see.
meanings.sent2: The monument immortalises the heroes of the past.
meanings.sent3: The time capsule immortalises the current culture for people in the future to discover.
meanings.sent4: The plaque immortalises the names of those who contributed to the community.
meanings.sent5: The film immortalises the true story of bravery and sacrifice.
